information: The company ERXLEBEN & KRAPPMANN GMBH, is a Distributor, founded in 1944, which operates in the Nuts and bolts industry. It also operates in the Hardware, building construction, Industrial hardware, Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment, and Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment industries. It is based in Leipzig, Germany.
